QuestData.Title: Sufficient Motivation
QuestData.Description: Training these savages has been quite a task, $n.$b$bFinding ways to motivate them was easy enough; the problem is keeping them motivated.. and focused... and awake.$b$bNow that you're back, you can help me in getting the less disciplined Hozen moving, if you catch my drift. I'll leave the method up to you.
